snippet: It was a little over 50 weeks before Jesus Castanon and Shackleford returned to the winner's circle, in the Grade II Churchill Downs Stakes on Saturday.
abstract: It was a little over 50 weeks before Jesus Castanon and Shackleford returned to the winner's circle, in the Grade II Churchill Downs Stakes on Saturday.

headline.main: For Horse and Rider, a Perfect Pairing
